metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13960 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In libjpeg-turbo 2.0.2, a large amount of memory can be usedduring processing of an invalid progressive JPEG image containing incorrectwidth and height values in the image header. NOTE: the vendor'sexpectation, for use cases in which this memory usage would be a denial ofservice, is that the application should interpret libjpeg warnings as fatalerrors (aborting decompression) and/or set limits on resource consumptionor image sizes.

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
